package.name: Net_HL7
package.description: This package provides an HL7 API for creating, sending and manipulating HL7 messages. HL7 is a protocol on the 7th OSI layer (hence the '7' in HL7) for messaging in Health Care environments. HL7 means 'Health Level 7'. HL7 is a protocol with a wealth of semantics that defines hundreds of different messages and their meaning, but also defines the syntactics of composing and sending messages. The API is focused on the syntactic level of HL7, so as to remain as flexible as possible. The package is a translation of the Perl HL7 Toolkit and will be kept in sync with this initiative.
